owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Jakob Beetz
Jyrki Oraskai
Oliver Schulz
owl:Ontology.terms:description: BCF 2.1 Ontology Description based on https://github.com/buildingSMART/BCF-XML
owl:Ontology.terms:title: BIM collaboration Format Ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The user to whom this topic is assigned to. Recommended to be in email format. The list of possible values are defined in the extension schema.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Assigned To

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Comment author
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Author

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Bitmap
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Bitmap

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Clipping Planes
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Clipping Planes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Coloring class
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Coloring

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The author who modified the comment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Comment Modified Author

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to a resource containing URIs for Comments.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Comments Container

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Pointer to the Component
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Component

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: User who created the topic.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Creation Author

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Exception
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Exception

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: URI to the extension schema.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Extension Schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The link to the linked data Ifc Element.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Ifc Element

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Tags for grouping Topics. The list of possible values are defined in the extension schema.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Label

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Lines
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Lines

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the system in which the component is originated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Originating System

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the orthogonal camera
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Orthogonal Camera

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Perspective Camera
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Perspective Camera

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Topic priority. The list of possible values are defined in the extension schema.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Priority

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Reference to the corresponding Project
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Project

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Selection class
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Selection

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Stage this topic is part of (Predefined list).
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Stage

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A link to the relating comment
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Topic

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: User who modified the topic. Exists only when Topic has been modified after creation.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Topic Modified Author

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the topic (Predefined list)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Topic Status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the topic (Predefined list)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Topic Type

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to a resource containing URIs for Topics.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Topics Container

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Back reference to the viewpoint
The viewpoint
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Viewpoint

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Link to a resource containing URIs for Viewpoints.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Viewpoints Container

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Proportional relationship between the width and the height of the view (w/h)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Aspect Ratio

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the system in which the component is originated
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Authoring Tool Id

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of the comment
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Comment Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date when comment was modified
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Comment Modified Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The comment text
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Comment Text

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date when the topic was created.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Creation Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Default Visibility
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Default Visibility

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the topic.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Description

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date until when the topics issue needs to be resolved.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Due Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Camera's field of view angle in degrees.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Vield Of View

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GUID of the resource
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has GUID

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The IfcGuid of the component
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Ifc Guid

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number to maintain the order of the topics.
Parameter for sorting
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Index

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the project.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: GUID of the Project
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Project ID

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The URL of the snapshot(.png)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Snapshot

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Title of the topic.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Title

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date when the topic was last modified. Exists only when Topic has been modified after creation.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has Topic Modified Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Proportion of camera view to model
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has View To World Scale

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Openings Visible class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: openings Visible

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Space Boundaries Visible class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: space Boundaries Visible

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Object Property, pointing to the Spaces Visible class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: spaces Visible

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A list of bitmaps can be used to add more information, for example, text in the visualization.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bitmap

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Camera View
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ClippingPlanes can be used to define a subsection of a building model that is related to the topic. Each clipping plane is defined by Location and Direction.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clipping Planes

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Coloring element lists colors and a list of associated components that should be displayed with the specified color when displaying a viewpoint. The color is given in ARGB format. Colors are represented as 6 or 8 hexadecimal digits. If 8 digits are present, the first two represent the alpha (transparency) channel. For example, 40E0D0 would be the color <span style="color:#40E0D0;";>Turquoise. More information about the color format can be found on Wikipedia.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Coloring

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The markup file can contain comments related to the topic. Their purpose is to record discussion between different parties related to the topic. Comment has also the Guid attribute for identifying it uniquely.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Comment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A component that links to a building element.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Component

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Components to hide/show determined by default_visibility.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Exception

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The extension define the mapping of a BCF project.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Extension Schema

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The label is for tagging the Issue to be able to make a better categorization
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Label

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lines can be used to add markup in 3D. Each line is defined by three dimensional Start Point and End Point. Lines that have the same start and end points are to be considered points and may be displayed accordingly.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lines

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Software with which the respective element was created
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Originating System

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This element describes a viewpoint using orthogonal camera.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Orthogonal Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This element describes a viewpoint using perspective camera.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Perspective Camera

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Indication of the Priority of an Issue
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Priority

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The project contains reference information about the project the topics belong to.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Selected components
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Selection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: To what stage of the project does the Topic relate to?
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Topic node contains reference information of the topic. It has one attribute, Guid, which is the topic GUID.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Status of the issue. Is it still active or closed?
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic Status

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The Topic Type specifies the use case of a BCF Issue. E.g. an Information request, an error etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Topic Type

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The markup file can contain multiple viewpoints related to one or more comments. A viewpoint has also the Guid attribute for identifying it uniquely.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Viewpoint

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Points to the Camera direction, defined as wktLiteral
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Camera Direction

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Points to the Camera up vector, defined as wktLiteral
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Camera Up Vector

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Points to the Camera location, defined as wktLiteral
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has Camera View Point
